tooltip: Create/Add a new sample entity list in a selected database.
Copy or move one or more existing sample entity lists to a target database.
Permanently remove one or more sample entity lists from a selected database.

toolTip: Rename an existing sample entity list.

text: Add Samples to Sample Entity List
toolTip: Add additional samples to an existing sample entity list.

text: Remove Samples from Sample Entity List
toolTip: Remove one or more samples from an existing sample entity list.
